itemDescription: Advocate and campaigner for disabled children, local politician (1871-1960)

wikipedia_page.main: Norah Lillian Fry (1871–1960) was a member of a Bristol Quaker Fry family of the J. S. Fry & Sons company. She was an advocate and campaigner for disabled children and those with learning difficulties and in 1918 became the first female councillor in Somerset.
